DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety NAB001 topical treatment mild moderate distal onychomycosis toenail 52 week compare efficacy NAB001 vehicle alone end study ( Week 56 ) treat 52 week .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy NAB001 Treatment Mild Moderate Onychomycosis Toenails
DOC.criteria: mild moderate fungal infection toenail assess study doctor koh positive & dermatophyte culture positive Visit 1 general good health assess study doctor severe fungal toenail infection prior use antifungal drug ( washout allow , duration varies class ) significant confound condition assess study doctor pregnancy/lactation must forego nail salon procedure study least ~60 week
